artvertiser.cpp

Go to the documentation of this file.
00001 /*
00002 
00003  * Credits: Julian Oliver, 2008-2009 <julian@julianoliver.com>.
00004  * 
00005  * This program is free software: you can redistribute it and/or modify it
00006  * under the terms of the GNU General Public License as published by the Free
00007  * Software Foundation, either version 3 of the License, or (at your option)
00008  * any later version.
00009  * 
00010  * This program is distributed in the hope that it will be useful, but WITHOUT
00011  * ANY WARRANTY; without even the implied warranty of MERCHANTABILITY or
00012  * FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE.  See the GNU General Public License for
00013  * more details.
00014  * 
00015  * You should have received a copy of the GNU General Public License along with
00016  * this program.  If not, see <http://www.gnu.org/licenses/>.
00017  * 
00018  * This code is loosely based on the 'multigl' sample from Bazar. it has been
00019  * modified to support texture and video-texture mapping to an OpenGL plane over
00020  * the ROI. The ROI in the model image is now read in from a file generated by
00021  * the training process, speeding up compositing and making it more accurate
00022  * than corner-finding each frame.
00023  *
00024  * Archival video can be used instead of a capture interface also. This required
00025  * a simple modification of the 'multigrab.cpp' also.
00026  * 
00027  * Usage:
00028  * 
00029  * There are four ways to use Artvertiser.
00030  * 
00031  * With video substitution of the ROI: 
00032  *
00033  *       ./artvertiser -a /path/to/ROIvideo.avi 
00034  *
00035  * With video substitution of the ROI and capture from an AVI file
00036  *
00037  *  ./artvertiser -a /path/to/ROIvideo.avi -b /path/to/captureVideo
00038  *
00039  * With image substitution of the ROI and capture from a v4l device
00040  *
00041  *      ./artvertiser  
00042  *
00043 
00044 */

00158 /* use this to read paths from the file system
00159 
00160 std::string getExtension(const std::string &file)
00161 {
00162         string::size_type dot = file.rfind('.');
00163         string lcpath = file;
00164         string suffix;
00165         std::transform(lcpath.begin(), lcpath.end(), lcpath.begin(), tolower);
00166         if(dot != std::string::npos) 
00167         {
00168                 suffix = lcpath.substr(dot + 1);
00169         }
00170         return suffix;
00171 }
00172 */

00174 // mouse input using GLUT.
00175 void entry(int state)
00176 {
00177         if (state == GLUT_ENTERED)
00178                 cout << "Mouse Entered" << endl;
00179         else
00180                 cout << "Mouse Left" << endl;
00181 }
00182 
00183 void mouse(int button, int state, int x, int y)
00184 {
00185         if (button == GLUT_RIGHT_BUTTON)
00186         {
00187                 if (state == GLUT_DOWN)
00188                 {
00189                         label = true;
00190                 }
00191                 
00192                 else
00193                 {
00194                         label = false;
00195                 }
00196         }
00197         else if (button == GLUT_LEFT_BUTTON)
00198         {
00199                 if (state == GLUT_DOWN)
00200                 {
00201                         lbuttonDown = true;
00202                         if (cnt >= NUMARTVERTS-1)
00203                         {
00204                                 cnt = 0;
00205                         }
00206                         else
00207                         {
00208                                 cnt ++;
00209                         }
00210                 }
00211                 else
00212                         lbuttonDown = false;
00213         }
00214         std::cout << "we are on image " << cnt << std::endl;
00215 }

00218 static void drawText(IplImage *img, const char *text, CvPoint point, CvFont *font, CvScalar colour, double size)

00220         cvInitFont( font, CV_FONT_HERSHEY_DUPLEX, size, size, 0, 1, CV_AA);
00221         //cvInitFont( font, CV_FONT_HERSHEY_PLAIN, size, size, 0, 1, CV_AA);
00222         cvPutText(img, text, point, font, colour);
00223 }

00225 // read in ROI coords from txt file into vector.
00226 static std::vector<int>  readROI(const char *filename)
00227 {
00228         string l;
00229         ifstream roi(filename);
00230         std::vector<int> v;
00231         int coord;
00232         char s[10];
00233         char *s1;
00234         int lines = 0;
00235 
00236         if (roi.is_open())
00237         {
00238                 while (!roi.eof())
00239                 {
00240                         getline(roi, l);
00241                         strcpy(s, l.c_str());
00242                         s1 = strtok(s, " ");
00243         
00244                         while (s1 != NULL)
00245                         {
00246                                 //roi_vec.push_back(atoi(s1));
00247                                 v.push_back(atoi(s1));
00248                                 s1 = strtok(NULL, " ,");
00249                         }       
00250                 }
00251                 roi.close();
00252         }
00253         else 
00254         {
00255                 cout << "roi file not found" << endl;
00256         }
00257         return v;
00258 }

00268     glViewport(0,0,winWidth, winHeight);
00269         glutPostRedisplay();

00273 static void usage(const char *s) {
00274         cerr << "usage:\n" << s
00275                         << "[-m <model image>] [-r]\n"
00276                         "   -a  specify path to AVI (instead of v4l device)\n"
00277                         "       -b      specify path to AVI video artvert\n"
00278                         "       -m      specifies model image\n"
00279                         "       -r      do not load any data\n"
00280                         "       -t      train a new classifier\n"
00281                         "       -g      recompute geometric calibration\n"
00282                         "       -a  <path> load an AVI movie as an artvert\n"
00283                         "       -l      rebuild irradiance map from scratch\n";
00284         exit(1);
00285 }
00286 
00295 static bool init( int argc, char** argv )
00296 {
00297         // more from before init should be moved here
00298         bool redo_geom=false;
00299         bool redo_training=false;
00300         bool redo_lighting=false;
00301         char *avi_bg_path="";
00302         char *modelFile = "model.bmp";
00303 
00304         // parse command line
00305         for (int i=1; i<argc; i++) {
00306                 if (strcmp(argv[i], "-m") ==0) {
00307                         if (i==argc-1) usage(argv[0]);
00308                         modelFile = argv[i+1];
00309                         i++;
00310                 } else if (strcmp(argv[i], "-r")==0) {
00311                         redo_geom=redo_training=redo_lighting=true;
00312                 } else if (strcmp(argv[i], "-g")==0) {
00313                         redo_geom=true;
00314                 } else if (strcmp(argv[i], "-l")==0) {
00315                         redo_lighting=true;
00316                 } else if (strcmp(argv[i], "-t")==0) {
00317                         redo_training=true;
00318                 } else if (strcmp(argv[i], "-a")==0) {
00319                         avi_capture=cvCaptureFromAVI(argv[i+1]);
00320                         avi_play=true;
00321                 } else if (strcmp(argv[i], "-b")==0) {
00322                         avi_bg_path=argv[i+1];
00323                 } else if (strcmp(argv[i], "-i")==0) {
00324                         image_path=argv[i+1];
00325                 } else if (argv[i][0]=='-') {
00326                         usage(argv[0]);
00327                 } 
00328         }
00329 
00330         cout << avi_bg_path << endl;    
00331         cacheLight = !redo_lighting;
00332 
00333         multi = new MultiGrab(modelFile);
00334 
00335         if( multi->init(!redo_training, avi_bg_path) ==0)
00336         {
00337                 cerr <<"Initialization error.\n";
00338                 return false;
00339         }
00340 
00341         geom_calib_start(!redo_geom);
00342 
00343         artvert_struct artvert1 = {"Arrebato, 1980", image1, "Feb, 2009", "Iv√°n Zulueta", "Polo Commercial", "Madrid, Spain"};
00344         artvert_struct artvert2 = {"name2", image2, "2008", "simon innings", "Helmut Lang", "Parlance Avenue"};
00345         artvert_struct artvert3 = {"name3", image3, "2008", "simon innings", "Loreal", "Parlance Avenue"};
00346         artvert_struct artvert4 = {"name4", image4, "2008", "simon innings", "Hugo Boss", "Parlance Avenue"};
00347         artvert_struct artvert5 = {"name5", image5, "2008", "simon innings", "Burger King", "Parlance Avenue"};
00348 
00349         artverts[0] = artvert1;
00350         artverts[1] = artvert2;
00351         artverts[2] = artvert3;
00352         artverts[3] = artvert4;
00353         artverts[4] = artvert5;
00354 
00355         const char *roiChar = strcat(modelFile, ".roi");
00356         roiVec = readROI(roiChar);
00357 
00358         return true;
00359 }
00360 
00365 static void keyboard(unsigned char c, int x, int y)
00366 {
00367         switch (c) {
00368                 case 'n' : if (augment == 1)
00369                                                 augment = 0;
00370                                         else
00371                                                 augment = 1;
00372                 case '+' : if (current_cam < multi->cams.size()-1) 
00373                                    current_cam++;
00374                            break;
00375                 case '-': if (current_cam >= 1) 
00376                                   current_cam--;
00377                           break;
00378                 case 'q': exit(0); break;
00379                 case 'd': dynamicLight = !dynamicLight; break;
00380                 case 'a': if (avi_play == true)
00381                                         avi_play = false;
00382                                   else
00383                                         avi_play = true;
00384                 case 'f': glutFullScreen(); break;
00385                 case 'i': if (cnt >= NUMARTVERTS-1)
00386                                         cnt = 0;
00387                                   else
00388                                         cnt ++;
00389                                   std::cout << "we are on image " << cnt << std::endl;
00390                                   break;
00391         }
00392         glutPostRedisplay();
00393 }

00395 static void emptyWindow() 
00396 {
00397         glClear(GL_COLOR_BUFFER_BIT | GL_DEPTH_BUFFER_BIT);
00398 }

00400 int main(int argc, char *argv[])
00401 {
00402         glutInit(&argc, argv);
00403         glutInitDisplayMode(GLUT_RGB | GLUT_DEPTH | GLUT_DOUBLE);
00404     glutInitWindowSize(WIDTH,HEIGHT); // hard set the init window size
00405     //glutInitWindowSize(800,450); // hard set the init window size
00406 
00407         glutDisplayFunc(emptyWindow);
00408     glutReshapeFunc(reshape);
00409         glutCreateWindow("artvertiser demo v-1.0");
00410         glutMouseFunc(mouse);
00411         glutEntryFunc(entry);
00412 
00413     //ftglFont = new FTBufferFont("/usr/share/fonts/truetype/freefont/FreeMono.ttf");
00414     ftglFont = new FTBufferFont("fonts/FreeSans.ttf");
00415     ftglFont->FaceSize(12);
00416     ftglFont->CharMap(ft_encoding_unicode);
00417 
00418         if (!init(argc,argv)) return -1;
00419 
00420         cvDestroyAllWindows();
00421 
00422         glutKeyboardFunc(keyboard);
00423         glutMainLoop();
00424         return 0; /* ANSI C requires main to return int. */
00425 }
00426 
00428 static bool drawBackground(IplTexture *tex)
00429 {
00430         if (!tex || !tex->getIm()) return false;
00431 
00432         IplImage *im = tex->getIm();
00433         int w = im->width-1;
00434         int h = im->height-1;
00435 
00436         glMatrixMode(GL_PROJECTION);
00437         glLoadIdentity();
00438         glMatrixMode(GL_MODELVIEW);
00439         glLoadIdentity();
00440 
00441         glDisable(GL_BLEND);
00442         glDisable(GL_DEPTH_TEST);
00443 
00444         tex->loadTexture();
00445 
00446         glBegin(GL_QUADS);
00447         glColor4f(1,1,1,1);
00448 
00449         glTexCoord2f(tex->u(0), tex->v(0));
00450         glVertex2f(-1, 1);
00451         glTexCoord2f(tex->u(w), tex->v(0));
00452         glVertex2f(1, 1);
00453         glTexCoord2f(tex->u(w), tex->v(h));
00454         glVertex2f(1, -1);
00455         glTexCoord2f(tex->u(0), tex->v(h));
00456         glVertex2f(-1, -1);
00457         glEnd();
00458 
00459         tex->disableTexture();
00460 
00461         return true;
00462 }
00463 
00471 static void geom_calib_draw(void)
00472 {
00473         glClear(GL_COLOR_BUFFER_BIT | GL_DEPTH_BUFFER_BIT);
00474 
00475         glDisable(GL_LIGHTING);
00476         drawBackground(frameTexture);
00477 
00478         if (!multi) return;
00479 
00480         IplImage *im = multi->cams[current_cam]->frame;
00481         planar_object_recognizer &detector(multi->cams[current_cam]->detector);
00482         if (!im) return;
00483 
00484         glMatrixMode(GL_PROJECTION);
00485         glLoadIdentity();
00486         glOrtho(0, im->width-1, im->height-1, 0, -1, 1);
00487 
00488         glMatrixMode(GL_MODELVIEW);
00489         glLoadIdentity();
00490 
00491         glDisable(GL_BLEND);
00492         glDisable(GL_LIGHTING);
00493         glDisable(GL_DEPTH_TEST);
00494 
00495         if (detector.object_is_detected) 
00496         {
00497                 glPointSize(2);
00498                 glBegin(GL_POINTS);
00499                 glColor4f(0,1,0,1);
00500                 for (int i=0; i<detector.match_number; ++i) 
00501                 {
00502                         image_object_point_match * match = detector.matches+i;
00503                         if (match->inlier) 
00504                         {
00505                                 int s = (int)(match->image_point->scale);
00506                                 float x=PyrImage::convCoordf(match->image_point->u, s, 0);
00507                                 float y=PyrImage::convCoordf(match->image_point->v, s, 0);
00508                                 glVertex2f(x,y);
00509                         }
00510                 }
00511                 glEnd();
00512         }
00513 
00514         glutSwapBuffers();
00515 }
00516 
00520 static void geom_calib_end()
00521 {
00522 
00523         if (!multi->model.augm.LoadOptimalStructureFromFile("camera_c.txt", "camera_r_t.txt")) 
00524         {
00525                 cout << "failed to load camera calibration.\n";
00526                 exit(-1);
00527         }
00528         glutIdleFunc(0);
00529         //glutDisplayFunc(0);
00530         delete calib;
00531         calib=0;
00532 }
00533 
00539 static void geom_calib_idle(void)
00540 {
00541         // acquire images
00542         multi->grabFrames();
00543 
00544         // detect the calibration object in every image
00545         // (this loop could be paralelized)
00546         int nbdet=0;
00547         for (int i=0; i<multi->cams.size(); ++i) 
00548         {
00549                 if (multi->cams[i]->detect()) nbdet++;
00550         }
00551 
00552         if(!frameTexture) frameTexture = new IplTexture;
00553         frameTexture->setImage(multi->cams[current_cam]->frame);
00554 
00555         if (nbdet>0) {
00556                 for (int i=0; i<multi->cams.size(); ++i) {
00557                         if (multi->cams[i]->detector.object_is_detected) {
00558                                 add_detected_homography(i, multi->cams[i]->detector, *calib);
00559                         } else {
00560                                 calib->AddHomography(i);
00561                         }
00562                 }
00563                 geom_calib_nb_homography++;
00564         }
00565 
00566         if (geom_calib_nb_homography>=150) {
00567                 if (calib->Calibrate(
00568                                         50, // max hom
00569                                         (multi->cams.size() > 1 ? 1:2),   // padding or random
00570                                         (multi->cams.size() > 1 ? 0:3),
00571                                         1,   // padding ratio 1/2
00572                                         0,
00573                                         0,
00574                                         0.0078125,      //alpha
00575                                         0.9,            //beta
00576                                         0.001953125,//gamma
00577                                         10,       // iter
00578                                         0.05, //eps
00579                                         3   //postfilter eps
00580                                    )) 
00581                 {
00582                         calib->PrintOptimizedResultsToFile1();
00583                         geom_calib_end();
00584                         photo_start();
00585                         return;
00586                 }
00587         }
00588         glutPostRedisplay();
00589 }
00590 
00594 static void geom_calib_start(bool cache)
00595 {
00596         if (cache && multi->model.augm.LoadOptimalStructureFromFile("camera_c.txt", "camera_r_t.txt")) {
00597                 photo_start();
00598                 return;
00599         }
00600 
00601         // construct a CamCalibration object and register all the cameras
00602         calib = new CamCalibration();
00603 
00604         for (int i=0; i<multi->cams.size(); ++i) {
00605                 calib->AddCamera(multi->cams[i]->width, multi->cams[i]->height);
00606         }
00607 
00608         geom_calib_nb_homography=0;
00609         glutDisplayFunc(geom_calib_draw);
00610         glutIdleFunc(geom_calib_idle);
00611 }
00612 
00613 //#define DEBUG_SHADER
00618 static void photo_draw(void)
00619 {
00620         glClear(GL_COLOR_BUFFER_BIT | GL_DEPTH_BUFFER_BIT);
00621 
00622         glDisable(GL_LIGHTING);
00623 
00624         // this is a better place for the frame drawing function (draw always) but we miss out on the
00625         // overlay drawing later. will find way to do both.
00626 
00627         drawBackground(frameTexture);
00628 
00629         string cnt_str;
00630         std::stringstream cnt_out;
00631         cnt_out << cnt;
00632         cnt_str = cnt_out.str();
00633 
00634         if (!multi) return;
00635 
00636         IplImage *im = multi->model.image;
00637         if (!im) return;
00638 
00639         // time running. perhaps useful for something?
00640     int now = glutGet(GLUT_ELAPSED_TIME);
00641         //cout << now/1000.0 << endl;
00642         //time_t rawtime;
00643         //struct tm *timeinfo;
00644         //char tBuffer[80];
00645         //time ( &rawtime );
00646         //timeinfo = localtime ( &rawtime );
00647         //strftime (tBuffer,80,"%I:%M:%S:%p, %d %b %Y",timeinfo);
00648         /*
00649         string timeStr;
00650         std::stringstream _timeStr;
00651         _timeStr << tBuffer;
00652         timeStr = _timeStr.str();
00653         */
00654 
00655         if (frameOK and augment == 1) {
00656 
00657                 foundMatch = 1;
00658                 // Fetch object -> image, world->image and world -> object matrices
00659                 CvMat *proj = multi->model.augm.GetProjectionMatrix(current_cam);
00660                 CvMat *world = multi->model.augm.GetObjectToWorld();
00661 
00662                 Mat3x4 moveObject, rot, obj2World, movedRT_;
00663                 moveObject.setTranslate(im->width/2,im->height/2,-120*3/4);
00664                 rot.setRotate(Vec3(1,0,0),2*M_PI*180.0/360.0);
00665                 moveObject.mul(rot);
00666                 CvMat cvMoveObject = cvMat(3,4,CV_64FC1, moveObject.m);
00667                 CvMat movedRT=cvMat(3,4,CV_64FC1,movedRT_.m);
00668 
00669                 double a_proj[3][4];
00670                 for( int i = 0; i < 3; i++ )
00671                         for( int j = 0; j < 4; j++ ) {
00672                                 a_proj[i][j] = cvmGet( proj, i, j );
00673                                 obj2World.m[i][j] = cvmGet(world, i, j);
00674                 }
00675 
00676                 CamCalibration::Mat3x4Mul( world, &cvMoveObject, &movedRT);
00677                 // translate into OpenGL PROJECTION and MODELVIEW matrices
00678                 PerspectiveCamera c;
00679                 c.loadTdir(a_proj, multi->cams[0]->frame->width, multi->cams[0]->frame->height);
00680                 c.flip();
00681                 c.setPlanes(100,1000000); // near/far clip planes
00682                 cvReleaseMat(&proj);
00683 
00684                 // must set the model view after drawing the background.
00685                 c.setGlProjection();            
00686                 c.setGlModelView();
00687 
00688 #ifndef DEBUG_SHADER
00689 
00690                 glEnable(GL_DEPTH_TEST);
00691                 glEnable(GL_BLEND);
00692                 glBlendFunc(GL_SRC_ALPHA, GL_ONE_MINUS_SRC_ALPHA);
00693                 glDisable(GL_CULL_FACE);
00694 
00695                 glTexEnvf(GL_TEXTURE_ENV, GL_TEXTURE_ENV_MODE, GL_MODULATE); // multiply texture colour by surface colour of poly
00696                 glHint(GL_PERSPECTIVE_CORRECTION_HINT, GL_NICEST);      
00697                 
00698                 if (avi_play == true)
00699                 {
00700                         IplImage *avi_frame = 0;
00701                         IplImage *avi_image = 0;
00702                         avi_frame = cvQueryFrame( avi_capture );
00703                         avi_image = cvCreateImage(cvSize(WIDTH/2, HEIGHT/2), 8, 3); 
00704                         cvResize(avi_frame, avi_image, 0); // have to scale to power of two. will work out padding to avoid scale distortion later.
00705                         avi_image->origin = avi_frame->origin;
00706                         GLenum format = IsBGR(avi_image->channelSeq) ? GL_BGR_EXT : GL_RGBA;
00707 
00708                         if (!avi_play_init)
00709                         {
00710                                 glGenTextures(1, &imageID);
00711                                 glBindTexture(GL_TEXTURE_2D, imageID);
00712                                 glPixelStorei(GL_UNPACK_ALIGNMENT, 1);
00713                                 glTexParameteri(GL_TEXTURE_2D, GL_TEXTURE_MIN_FILTER, GL_NEAREST);
00714                                 glTexParameteri(GL_TEXTURE_2D, GL_TEXTURE_MAG_FILTER, GL_NEAREST);
00715                                 glTexImage2D(GL_TEXTURE_2D, 0, GL_RGBA, avi_image->width, avi_image->height, 0, format, GL_UNSIGNED_BYTE, avi_image->imageData);
00716                                 avi_play_init=true;
00717                         }
00718                     else 
00719                         {
00720                                  glBindTexture(GL_TEXTURE_2D, imageID);
00721                                  glTexSubImage2D(GL_TEXTURE_2D, 0, 0, 0, avi_image->width, avi_image->height, format, GL_UNSIGNED_BYTE, avi_image->imageData);  
00722                         }
00723                 }
00724                 else
00725                 {
00726                         glBindTexture(GL_TEXTURE_2D, imageID);
00727                         glTexParameteri(GL_TEXTURE_2D, GL_TEXTURE_MIN_FILTER, GL_NEAREST);
00728                         glTexParameteri(GL_TEXTURE_2D, GL_TEXTURE_MAG_FILTER, GL_NEAREST);
00729                         IplImage image = *artverts[cnt].image;
00730                 GLenum format = IsBGR(image.channelSeq) ? GL_BGR_EXT : GL_RGBA;
00731                         glTexImage2D(GL_TEXTURE_2D, 0, GL_RGBA, image.width, image.height, 0, format, GL_UNSIGNED_BYTE, image.imageData);
00732                 }
00733                         
00734                 glEnable(GL_TEXTURE_2D);
00735 
00736                 glHint(GL_POLYGON_SMOOTH, GL_NICEST);
00737                 glEnable(GL_POLYGON_SMOOTH);
00738 
00739                 // create a simple fade-in when we have a track
00740                 if (fade < 1.0)
00741                 {
00742                         fade += 0.1 * fadeSpeed;
00743                 }
00744                 else
00745                 {
00746                         fade = 1;
00747                 }
00748 
00749                 glColor4f(1.0, 1.0, 1.0, fade);
00750 
00751                 glBegin(GL_QUADS);
00752                         glTexCoord2f(0, 0);glVertex3f(roiVec[0], roiVec[1], 0);
00753                         glTexCoord2f(1, 0);glVertex3f(roiVec[2], roiVec[3], 0);
00754                         glTexCoord2f(1, 1);glVertex3f(roiVec[4], roiVec[5], 0);
00755                         glTexCoord2f(0, 1);glVertex3f(roiVec[6], roiVec[7], 0);
00756                 glEnd();
00757 
00758                 glDisable(GL_TEXTURE_2D);
00759 
00760                 // 'label' is a boolean set by the right mouse button and toggles the
00761                 // in-scene artvert label.
00762                 if (label)
00763                 {
00764                         glBegin(GL_LINE_LOOP);
00765                                 glColor3f(0.0, 1.0, 0.0);
00766                                 glVertex3f(roiVec[0]-10, roiVec[1]-10, 0);
00767                                 glVertex3f(roiVec[2]+10, roiVec[3]-10, 0);
00768                                 glVertex3f(roiVec[4]+10, roiVec[5]+10, 0);
00769                                 glVertex3f(roiVec[6]-10, roiVec[7]+10, 0);
00770                                 glVertex3f(roiVec[0]-10, roiVec[1]-10, 0);
00771                         glEnd();
00772 
00773                         glTranslatef(roiVec[2]+12, roiVec[3], 0);
00774                         glRotatef(180, 1.0, 0.0, 0.0);
00775                         glRotatef(-45, 0.0, 1.0, 0.0);
00776                         glColor4f(0.0, 1.0, 0.0, 1);
00777 
00778                         glBegin(GL_LINE_LOOP);
00779                                 glVertex3f(0, 10, -.2); 
00780                                 glVertex3f(150, 10, -.2);       
00781                                 glVertex3f(150, -60, -.2);      
00782                                 glVertex3f(0, -60, -.2);        
00783                         glEnd();
00784 
00785                         glColor4f(0.0, 1.0, 0.0, .5);
00786 
00787                         glBegin(GL_QUADS);
00788                                 glVertex3f(0, 10, -.2); 
00789                                 glVertex3f(150, 10, -.2);       
00790                                 glVertex3f(150, -60, -.2);      
00791                                 glVertex3f(0, -60, -.2);        
00792                         glEnd();
00793                         
00794                         // render the text in the label
00795                         glColor4f(1.0, 1.0, 1.0, 1);
00796                         ftglFont->Render(artverts[cnt].artvert);
00797                         glTranslatef(0, -12, 0);
00798                         ftglFont->Render(artverts[cnt].date);
00799                         glTranslatef(0, -12, 0);
00800                         ftglFont->Render(artverts[cnt].author);
00801                         glTranslatef(0, -12, 0);
00802                         ftglFont->Render(artverts[cnt].advert);
00803                         glTranslatef(0, -12, 0);
00804                         ftglFont->Render(artverts[cnt].street);
00805                 }
00806 
00807 #else
00808 #endif
00809                 //glEnd();
00810 
00811 #ifndef DEBUG_SHADER
00812                 // apply the object transformation matrix
00813                 Mat3x4 w2e(c.getWorldToEyeMat());
00814                 w2e.mul(moveObject);
00815                 c.setWorldToEyeMat(w2e);
00816                 c.setGlModelView();
00817 #endif
00818 
00819                 if (multi->model.map.isReady()) {
00820                         glDisable(GL_LIGHTING);
00821 #ifdef DEBUG_SHADER
00822                         multi->model.map.enableShader(current_cam, world);
00823 #else
00824                         multi->model.map.enableShader(current_cam, &movedRT);
00825 #endif
00826                 } 
00827                 cvReleaseMat(&world);
00828                 {
00829                         CvScalar c =cvGet2D(multi->model.image, multi->model.image->height/2, multi->model.image->width/2);
00830                         glColor3d(c.val[2], c.val[1], c.val[0]);
00831                 }
00832                 if (multi->model.map.isReady())
00833                         multi->model.map.disableShader();
00834                 else
00835                         glDisable(GL_LIGHTING);
00836 
00837                 if ( avi_play == true  ) 
00838                 {
00839                         cvReleaseImage(&avi_image);
00840                         cvReleaseImage(&avi_frame);
00841                 }
00842         }
00843 
00844         else if (!frameOK)
00845         {
00846                 fade = 0.0;
00847         }
00848 
00849     glLoadIdentity();
00850         // we need to setup a new projection matrix for the title font.
00851         glMatrixMode(GL_PROJECTION);
00852         glLoadIdentity();
00853         glMatrixMode(GL_MODELVIEW);
00854         glLoadIdentity();
00855 
00856         glTranslatef(-.98, 0.9, 0.0);
00857         glScalef(.003, .003, .003);
00858         ftglFont->FaceSize(32);
00859         glColor4f(1.0, 1.0, 1.0, 1);
00860         ftglFont->Render("the artvertiser v0.2");
00861         ftglFont->FaceSize(16);
00862         glTranslatef(0, -(HEIGHT+30), 0);
00863         glColor4f(1.0, 1.0, 1.0, .6);
00864         //ftglFont->Render(tBuffer);
00865         if (foundMatch == 1 and (now/1000)%2== 0)
00866         {
00867                 glTranslatef(WIDTH-295, HEIGHT+35, 0);
00868                 glColor4f(0.0, 1.0, 0.0, .8);
00869                 glBegin(GL_TRIANGLES);
00870                         glVertex3f(140, 0, 0);  
00871                         glVertex3f(150, 10, 0); 
00872                         glVertex3f(140, 20, 0); 
00873                 glEnd();
00874                 glTranslatef(70, 5, 0);
00875                 ftglFont->FaceSize(16);
00876                 ftglFont->Render("tracking");
00877         }
00878 
00879         foundMatch=0;
00880         // reset the ftgl font size for next pass
00881         ftglFont->FaceSize(12);
00882 
00883         glutSwapBuffers();
00884         cvReleaseImage(&image); // cleanup used image
00885         glFlush();
00886 }
00887 
00892 static void photo_idle()
00893 {
00894         // acquire images
00895         multi->grabFrames();
00896 
00897         // detect the calibration object in every image
00898         // (this loop could be paralelized)
00899         int nbdet=1;
00900 
00901         multi->cams[0]->detect();
00902 
00903         if(!frameTexture) frameTexture = new IplTexture;
00904         frameTexture->setImage(multi->cams[current_cam]->frame);
00905 
00906         frameOK=false;
00907 
00908         multi->model.augm.Clear();
00909         if (multi->cams[0]->detector.object_is_detected) 
00910         {
00911                 add_detected_homography(0, multi->cams[0]->detector, multi->model.augm);
00912         } 
00913         else 
00914         {
00915                 multi->model.augm.AddHomography();
00916         }
00917         frameOK = multi->model.augm.Accomodate(4, 1e-4);
00918 
00919         if (frameOK) {
00920                 // fetch surface normal in world coordinates
00921                 CvMat *mat = multi->model.augm.GetObjectToWorld();
00922                 float normal[3];
00923                 for (int j=0;j<3;j++) normal[j] = cvGet2D(mat, j, 2).val[0];
00924                 cvReleaseMat(&mat);
00925         }
00926         glutPostRedisplay();
00927 }
00928 
00930 static void photo_start()
00931 {
00932         glutIdleFunc(photo_idle);
00933         glutDisplayFunc(photo_draw);
00934 }
